title: A revolutionary engineer and Victoria’s Indian confidant
itunes:title: A revolutionary engineer and Victoria’s Indian confidant
itunes:subtitle: Journalist and author Julian Glover describes the life and remarkable career of Georgian engineer Thomas Telford, the subject of his new biography. Meanwhile, we meet up with the writer Shrabani Basu to discuss the relationship of Queen Victoria with h...
description:
Journalist and author Julian Glover describes the life and remarkable career of Georgian engineer Thomas Telford, the subject of his new biography. Meanwhile, we meet up with the writer Shrabani Basu to discuss the relationship of Queen Victoria with her Indian teacher Abdul Karim

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
